title: 100K IP Creation Ideas
body: I'm slowly but most certainly approaching one hundred thousand influence points and the discussion I'd like to leave here is this. Does Riot plan on making any special content for purchase using a large amount of IP for those whom have been dedicated players long term. For me personally I own all the content in the store and can easily buy new champions with the IP i earn between champion releases, so therefore my IP just continues to accrue endlessly and needlessly. I just want some ideas to be brainstormed either here or Riot for what can be done. Thanks for reading and/or replying.

replies.body:
Wowzers. Here I was thinking of how we can get MORE IP by selling back runes we don't want/use (such as old lower tier runes) even at half the cost, so I can get the ones I want.
I never gave it a thought for those on the complete opposite end of the scale.

I think a specific banner for the 'seasoned veterans' of the game could work, specific levels each costing a lineal or exponential amount of IP more to obtain the next. Kind of like the stripes a general gets for service/achievements. If it were an exponential amount, then 'conquering the game' (as it were) could truly be improbable. Especially if you don't have a finite level cap, just keep it going up and up for those with ludicrous amounts of IP.
Then you could come and compare your e-peen with other seasoned vets {{item:1058}} 

Maybe each level could grant something a little special too. An extra rune or mastery page, exclusive skins.

Access to exclusive runes perhaps, like multi fit runes that can be used in any slot.
So for example, you could have health regeneration marks (I believe those don't exist).

Perhaps you could have exclusive access to a new mystery tier, things like "Generals Presence" where you give off an aura that grants extra hp/dmg/next attack deals reduced dmg for x seconds/etc etc

Other new unique masteries could be things like;
- reduced recall/tp time by x amount
- reducing time spent dead
- instant health/mana regen when on home spawn portal, for when those extra couple of seconds defending your Nexus are crucial
- "dragons call" when you get a ping when ever the dragon takes damage (would reset timer so no continuous pings) would tell you if enemy is doing dragon (maybe one for baron too).
- ability to call out a field medic every x minutes that insta heals for x amount
- exclusive use of skills in any map, such as ability to have snowball in summoners rift {{summoner:32}}


Other cool wank features could be at a certain Generals Level, whenever you walk out onto your lane, a red carpet could roll out in front of you and disappear after a min or so xD

Im sure some of these masteries mentioned could be seen as an 'unfair advantage', but dont we all get that when starting out. When i was level 10 summoner, i was playing level 20+ summoners who had use of tier 3 runes and twice the amount of available runes etc. I had none of that.
But I accepted this as it was a goal to achieve and something seasoned players should have had access too. This would be no different.
I wish you could get skins bought exclusively with large amounts of IP kind of like Hextech Annie and Soul Stealer Vayne with Hextech.

Well that is something I wish Riot to consider among other content. Skins are nice and all and definitely something a player wants for the champion they main. However, I'm thinking in a broader sense that the whole community can get behind as this is such a long term achievement it should be something that everyone can show off and be admired as well as respected for. The instance that I would like to see is a banner similar to the Honour banners at the moment. On a side note what kind of skin for which champion would you want?
